name: Connaxis
description:
As a global company we are present in 7 countries around the world: Argentina, Bolivia, Peru, United States, Spain, Poland and the Netherlands. We firmly believe that helping our customers achieve success is the only way to achieve our own success.
With our solid methodology, tested and improved over the years, we allowed our self to successfully develop a large number of projects throughout our history.

locations.address: Av. America, 978 Piso 5 Oficina 1 Edificio Nahí Center
